sentences.sContent: He would immolate himself for their noble cause .
sentences.sContent_eng: He would immolate himself for their noble cause .
sentences.sCn: 他愿意为他们的崇高事业牺牲自己。

sentences.sContent: I choose my career and immolate my time for health and family.
sentences.sContent_eng: I choose my career and immolate my time for health and family.
sentences.sCn: 我选择了事业而牺牲了健康和家庭的时间。

synos.tran: 献祭；牺牲；为供神而宰杀

remMethod.val: im(在…之上) + mola(用作祭品的肉) + te → 放上祭品 → 牺牲

words.tran: 祭物，供奉牲礼；宰杀，祭品
